name: Little Journey (ATremblay)
description:
This game was made during an assignment  of a programming class. We follow a little girl on her journey to save the tree of life!

What I have contributed to the project : 

-Quest system

-Dialogue system

-Projectile shooting and target interaction

GitHub : 

Development log and used assets can be found on the game's GitHub : https://github.com/UQAC-8DJV103-H23/travail-3-unity-nothingway-3
